description:
A compact and lightweight solution for carrying water back to camp. It's ready to hold lots of liquid when you need it, and it packs down to the size of your palm when you're done.

  • Made of non-absorbent 210-denier TPU-coated nylon in a watertight welded construction
  • Thicker base fabric is 240-denier TPU-coated nylon for added durability
  • Wide nylon handles are comfortable to hold and make it easy to carry when it's full
  • Free-standing when full (be careful if it's really blowing out)
  • Packs down to stow in storage pouch (included) for transport
name: Sea To Summit Folding Bucket
